item.description:
BYOI (That's Bring Your Own Improv) is back! You can get some more information here:

http://bringyourownimprov.com/default.htm

It's essentially the same thing as the TV Show Whose Line Is It Anyway? Audience members can sit and clap, yell out suggestions when needed, or, for those of us daring enough, can go up and participate in the onstage happenings. Here's some of the things they do:

http://bringyourownimprov.com/Games.htm

Tickets are typically $5 at the door. Because this is a Halloween show, it's a possibility that it might be more ($10). If something gets posted on the website, I will update here and in the comment section.

NOTE: The Perishible Theater is no longer there, but the address is the correct one for the location of the BYOI this evening.  Please reach out to me if you can't locate us.
item.name: BYOI Halloween Show (Bring Your Own Improv)!
